articles.content: Economists are being forced to revisit doom-laden forecasts for Brexit because they were so wrong first time around, laughably so in the case of the Treasury. In May 2016 a month before the referendu… [+1912 chars]

articles.author: Mike Lockley, Kirsty Feerick
articles.title: Worker who missed 808 shifts costing company £95k wins legal battle over unfair sacking - Daily Record
articles.description: Vic Rumbold cost his employer Land Rover Jaguar £95,850 in sick pay.
articles.content:
A worker who missed 808 shifts from calling in sick has won his legal battle over his unfair dismissal. 
Vic Rumbold cost his employer Land Rover Jaguar £95,850 in sick pay with his manager branding… [+4734 chars]
